9018.name: A Tertain's lair
description: You quite possibly have made a terrible mistake coming in here.
Exits lead east and west.
The passage leads west where you can see a bright light ahead.
The passage continues to the east

9038.name: Office of a Secundus
description: You are standing in a office of one of the Viceroys of the Plane of Nirvana.
The occupant doesn't look real thrilled with your presence.  The only exits is
west.
Looking west you can see a long hallway

9039.name: A Junction in the hallway
description: Your are standing in a junction, exits lead in all the cardinal directions.
To the south you see a small room
To the north, you spy a small room
To the west, the passageway continues
To the east, you see a quadruple junction

9012.name: Door to the Tower of Nirvana
description: You stand on the plane where a mighty door lies to the west.
The plane also continues north and southward.  There is a large sign on the
door.
The plane continues northward as far as the eye can see.
The plane continues southward as far as the eye can see.
The sign reads:
WARNING
Only those brave of heart and high of level should
enter the Tower of Nirvana.

9005.name: North-South direction of the plane
description: The plane continues to the north and south
To the north, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.
To the south, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.

9002.name: The Plane of Nirvana
description: You are on a western strech of the plane.  Boundaries to the east and
west seem nonexistent.
The plane continues to the west where is appears to change direction
The plane seems to strech forever to the east

9020.name: The Lair of Primus
description: You are in a large hall, with a massive pool of what appears to be pure energy
in the center of the room.  Exits lead in all the cardinal directions.  From
the pool rises the master of the Plane of Nirvana....
A passage leads south into the unknown.
A passage leads north into the unknown.
A passage leads west into the unknown.
A passage leads east into the unknown.

9052.name: Chamber of the Secudus
description: A large canvernous room, this chamber serves as the sleeping quarters for the
third Secudus, Viceroy to Primus. The only exit lies to the west.
To the west you can see a passageway.

9016.name: Dead End
description: You stand at a dead end where the only exit appears to be west.
The passage continue to the west.

9046.name: A Passageway
description: You are in a well lit passage.  A sense of forboding danger envelopes you.
Exits lead in all cardinal directions.
To the south, a chamber can be seen
To the north you can see a small chamber
To the west, a large tunnel can be found.
To the east, the passage continues,.

9045.name: The chamber of the second Secundus
description: This huge room is furnished with the finest, and a personal legion guards the
Secundus. the only exit is to the east.
To the east you can see a junction

9000.name: Entrance to the Plane of Nirvana
description: You stand before the entrance to a plane of absolute balance and order.
It is equally hot and cold, equally light and dark, and made of equal parts
of solid and liquid.  The plane extends to the west and east, while an exit
lies downward.
To the west, the plane extends for what seems to be forever.
To the east, the plane extends for what seems to be forever.
Downwards, you see the portal leading back to home.

9058.name: Chamber of The First Secundus
description: You have disturbed the rest of the First Viceroy to Primus the Prime, The
Secundus.  He does not look like a happy camper. The only exit lies to the
east.
To the east you can spot a hallway

9050.name: Chamber of a Hexton
description: You have entered the chamber of a Hexton.  Trophies adorn the walls, some of
which are human. the only exit is to the south.
To the south you can see a passageway.

9007.name: In the Tower of Nirvana
description: Entering the tower, there seems to be enough light to see by, but
no source is visible.  A hallway runs to the east while down below the
stairway touches the ground.
The hall continues east into oblivion.

9051.name: Chamber of a Hexton
description: You have entered a room where you are not very popular. The only exit lies
northbound.
To the north you can see a passage.

9024.name: A Tertian's lair
description: You find yourself in a lair of a Tertian.  Exits lead north and south.
To the north, you can make out a intersection of tunnels.
To the south, you can see a bright light.

9015.name: NS area on the Plane of Nirvana
description: the plane continues to the north and south
The plane continues endlessly to the north
The plane continues endlessly to the south

9001.name: The Plane of Nirvana
description: You are traveling the Plane of Nirvana.  It has endless boundaries to the
east and west
To the west, the plane seems to extend forever.
To the east, there seems to be a bend in direction of travel.

9009.name: EW hallway in the Tower of Nirvana
description: The hallway continues to the east, and stretches to the west.
The Hallway continues west into oblivion.
The hallway continues east into oblivion.

9014.name: NS area of the Plane of Nirvana
description: The plane continues to the north and southward.
The plane continues endlessly to the north.
The plane continues endlessly to the south.

9010.name: EW passage in the Tower of Nirvana

description: The Hallway contiues west into oblivion
The Hallway contiues east into oblivion

9017.name: Dead End
description: You are at what appears to be a dead end.  The only exit is back east.
The passage continues to the east.

9021.name: A Tertian's lair
description: Maybe coming here wasn't such a hot idea.  You feel very unwelcome here.
Exits lead north and south
The passage leads north where you can see a bright light.
The passage leads south into the unknown.

9029.name: EW route on the Plane of Nirvana
description: Exits lead east and west.
looking west, in the distance you can spy a curve south.
looking east, you spy a door far off in the distance.

9057.name: A room
description: You have entered a room where there was obviously a hurried move going on.
The only exit lies to the north.
To the north you can make out a passageway.

9042.name: An east-west passage
description: In east west passage is here with exits in all of the cardinal directions.
To the south you can make out a averaged sized room.
You can see a room to the north.
To the west you can see what appears to be a cavernous room.
To the east you can see a junction

9019.name: A Tertian's lair
description: You might have made a terrible mistake coming into here.
Exits lead east and west.
The passage continues westward into oblivion.
The passage continues eastward where you can see a bright light.

9044.name: The Commander's Post
description: You have stumbled on to the office of the Commander of the forces in the Plane
Of Nirvana.  The room is well furnished and a sense of courage and bravery
overtakes you as you enter the room.  The only exit lies to the north.
To the north you can visualize a junction of passages.

9028.name: A change of direction
description: Here, the plane takes a turm from the south to heading east.
Looking south, you view the plane extending for miles.
The plane heads east from here. You can't see the end of it.

9054.name: A small chamber
description: You are in a small cramped chamber.  The only exit lies to the south.
To the south you can see a passage

9013.name: Door to the Tower of Nirvana
description: The plane continue to the north and south, while a mighty door lies to the
east.  There is a sign on the door.
The plane continues to the south as far as the eye can see
The plane stretches to the north as far as the eye can see.
The sign reads:
WARNING!
Only those brave of heart and high of level
should attempt to enter the Tower of Nirvana.

9059.name: Junction in the hallway
description: Exits lead off in all of the cardinal directions
To the south, a small chamber can be found.
To the north lies a large chamber
To the west, lies a monstrous room.
To the east , the passage continues.

9004.name: A Change in Direction
description: Here, the plane goes to the north and bends to the east
The vast plane seems to have no end to the north
To the east, the plane has no visible end

9034.name: A small room
description: The only exit is north
Looking north, you spy an intersection.

9035.name: A passageway
description: Exits lead in all cardinal directions.
Looking south, you can see an average room.
Looking north you spy a average sized room.
Looking west, you can see an intersection ahead.
Looking east, you can make out a large room

9043.name: The Barracks
description: A dusty room, with a almost untolerable odor, the barracks are being inspected
by a Hexton and his personal enterage.
The only exit lies to the south.
To the south you can see junction

9041.name: Office of a Septon
description: A neat and tidy room, it appear to be inhabited my a neatenss freak.  The only
exit lies to the north.
To the north you see a junction.

9036.name: Lair of a Hexton
description: You are in a room that is in complete disrepair.  Items are thrown throughout
the room making them worthless piles of junk.
The only exit is back south
Looking south, you can make out a passage.

9049.name: End of the passageway
description: You have reached the end of a long east-west passage.  The passage contiues to
the west, and rooms lie to the north, south, and east.
To the south, a room can be seen.
To the north you can see a room
to the west, the passageway continues
To the east you can make out a large chamber

9037.name: Office of a Hexton
description: A makeshift desk forms the center of this room.  The only exit is north.
Looking north, you can make out a hallway.

9023.name: A wide north-south passageway
description: you find yourself in a passage where the exits are north and south
To the north, you spy an intersection of tunnels.
To the south you can barely make out a junction of passageways.

9053.name: A passageway
description: You are in a passagway where you may go in any cardinal direction.
To the south, you can spot a small room
To the north lies a small chamber
To the west, the passageway continues
To the east, a main passage forms a junction.

9030.name: EW route on The Plane of Nirvana
description: Exits lead east and west
glancing west, you can spy a door far off in the distance.
looking east, you can see a bend in the distance.

9026.name: An intersection of passages
description: You stand at an intersection.  Exits lead off to the east and south.
A door lies to the north
To the south you stare into oblivion.
To the east, you spy a dark passage

9011.name: Intersection in Tower of Nirvana
description: You are at an intersection where the east-west passage continues, but a large
passage leads to the north.
The passage continues to the north where it seems to get wider.
The passage continues westward into oblivion.

9003.name: A Change in Direction
description: Here, the plane seems to direct you to the north.  Also, the plane
continues to the west.
The plane continues to the north with no end in sight
The plane contiues to the west with no end in sight

9047.name: Chamber of the Octon
description: A small room, sparsely furnished, it leaves you with a sense of fear.  The
only exit is to the south
To the south you can see a passage.

9055.name: A cramped room
description: You are in a small, crowded room.  The only exit appears to lie to the north.
To the north, you can see a passageway.

9006.name: A North-South stretch of the plane
description: The plane continues to the north and the south
To the north, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.
To the south, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.

9025.name: A north south tunnel
description: You are in a passage where the only exits are north and south.
Far to the north you can see a door.
To the south you stare into darkness.

9060.name: Up a Spiraling Staircase
description: Before you stretches a magnificent staircase, wider than some of
the widest streets in the largest cities in all the realms.  It is
paved in marble and covered in thick growth of ivy and briarwood.

9032.name: A Junction in the passage
description: Here, passages lead off in all cardinal directions.
South of here is a small room.
Looking north, you spy a small room in the distance
West, you spy an intersection.
Eastward, the passage continues in the darkness.

9022.name: The office of a Quinton
description: You have stumbled upon the office of a page to Primus.
Scrolls lie about the room along with many strange objects...you can't imagine
what kind of creature would use them.  Exits lead in all the cardinal
directions.
The passage goes south into oblivion.
The passage heads northward where you can see nothing.
The passage heads westward into oblivion.
The passage goes east where you feel it might be bad to go.

9040.name: Office of an Octon
description: You see a messy room with papers scattered everywhere.
The only exit leads back to the south
To the south you can make out a junction.

9048.name: Chamber of the Nonaton
description: You have entered the chamber of the principal law and order overseers.  The
only exit lies to the north
To the north you can see a passageway.

9056.name: A large room
description: You have entered a room where you are not wanted.  The only exit lies to the
south.
To the south you can visualize a east-west passage.

9027.name: A change of direction
description: The plane curves from the south to west
looking west, you can't fathom how far the plane extends.
looking south, you see the plane extending beyond view.

9008.name: A hallway in the Tower of Nirvana
description: You are in a east-west hallway in the tower.  To the west, the hall
continues and a door lies to the east.
the hallway continues west into oblivion.

9033.name: The office of the Octon
description: you are in a small room, the only exit is south.
looking south, you see an intersection.

9061.name: Up a Spiraling Staircase
description: Before you stretches a magnificent staircase, wider than some of
the widest streets in the largest cities in all the realms.  It is
paved in marble and covered in thick growth of ivy and briarwood.

9031.name: A large door in the passage
description: The passages goes east and west, with a large door to the south.
looking west, you see more of the passage.
looking east, you see more of the passage.

9000.name: the tridrone~
description: You see what appears to be a 3 sided pyramid with spidery arms and legs.
9000.room_name: A tridrone is here doing a menial task.

9001.name: the quadrone~
description: A cubic creature, with spiny arms and legs.
9001.room_name: A quadrone is here watching for trespassers.

9002.name: the pentadrone~
description: A five-armed creature which resembles a starfish on thin stilt-like legs.
9002.room_name: The pentadrone is here policing the area.

9003.name: the decaton~
description: The decaton is a large, ten-tentacled sphere on stumpy legs.
9003.room_name: A decaton is here overseeing the other modrons.

9004.name: the nonaton~
description: A cylidrical modron with 9 tentacles and stubby legs.
9004.room_name: A nonaton is here preserving law and order.

9005.name: the octon~
description:
The octon has a collar at shoulder level with 8 tentacled arms growing out of
it.
9005.room_name: An octon is here governing his ward of responsilbility.

9006.name: the septon~
description:
The septon appears as a human with a large bald head. It has a shoulder collar
with 7 tentacles coming from it.
9006.room_name: A septon is here preserving order.

9007.name: the hexton~
description:
A hexton appears as a humanoid with 6 arms: 2 large human arms with 6 fingers,
and 4 tentacles below tipped with sharp claws.
9007.room_name: A hexton is here watching over his armies.

9008.name: the quinton~
description:
Quintons look like tall, stocky humanoids with 4 flexible arms jutting from the
shoulders.  A prehensile tail serves as the creature's 5th arm, and they have
fan-like wings attached to their shoulders.
9008.room_name: A quinton is here keeping records.

9009.name: the tertian~
description:
Tertians look very human, save for their 12 foot size, the horns jutting from
the sides of their bald heads, and the long prehensile tail ending in a mace-
like ball.
9009.room_name: A tertian is here administering the law.

9010.name: secundus~
description:
The secundi is an incredibly thin, tall humanoids with long, narrow faces
and deepset eyes. It radiates intense power.
9010.room_name: A Secundus, one of the Viceroys of Nirvana, is here.

9011.name: Primus~
description:
Primus is a huge being who rises out of the energy pool and glares at you with
violet eyes. His right hand is wreathed in darkness, his left in light, and
he looks very displeased to see you.
9011.room_name: Primus, ruler of the Plane of Nirvana, forms out of an energy pool.
